data.actual_result: Message user textbox in user profile pop-up extends out of borders of the app window
data.expected_result: Message user textbox in user profile pop-up should stay on the screen
data.short_description: "Message @User" textbox when left-clicking on an user is cut off the screen [14" 1366x768]
data.steps_to_repro: - In a server, click on a user playing a game - Add a note which takes up more than 5 rows to that user (shift+enter for a new line)
